system.description:
Starting at 6th level, the rewards your artifact promises have become even more invigorating and tantalizing.

Whenever you give into your artifact’s temptation, you can convert any number of the artifact charges you gain from it into exertion points instead.

Whenever you make a saving throw, if you haven’t given into your artifact’s temptation since finishing your last long rest, you automatically gain an expertise die instead of gaining one as a reaction.
